ILine¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

Display

Description:

Describes a line to help draw lines in hardware acceleration.

int32_t ILine::x0

Description:

X-axis coordinate of the start point of a line

Description:

Description:

int32_t ILine::y1

Description:
